org.osate.ge

Interface BusinessObjectContext


  • public interface BusinessObjectContext
    Interface for objects which are part of a hierarchical structure where each node references a business object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default java.util.stream.Stream<BusinessObjectContext> getAllDescendants() 
      default BusinessObjectContext getAncestor(int depth)
      Returns the ancestors which has a specified depth relative to this query.
      java.lang.Object getBusinessObject()
      Returns the business object associated with this context.
      default <T> java.util.Optional<T> getBusinessObject(java.lang.Class<T> c)
      Retrieves the business object contained in the business object context if it is an instance of the specified class.
      java.util.Collection<? extends BusinessObjectContext> getChildren()
      The children which are available for this context.
      static java.util.Optional<BusinessObjectContext> getFirstCommonAncestor(BusinessObjectContext q1, BusinessObjectContext q2) 
      BusinessObjectContext getParent()
      Returns the parent of the context.

    • Method Detail

      • getParent

        BusinessObjectContext getParent()
        Returns the parent of the context.
        Returns:
        the parent of the context. May return null.

      • getChildren

        java.util.Collection<? extends BusinessObjectContext> getChildren()
        The children which are available for this context.
        Returns:
        the context's children.
        Since:
        2.0

      • getBusinessObject

        java.lang.Object getBusinessObject()
        Returns the business object associated with this context.
        Returns:
        the business object for the context.

      • getAllDescendants

        default java.util.stream.Stream<BusinessObjectContext> getAllDescendants()
        Since:
        2.0

      • getAncestor

        default BusinessObjectContext getAncestor(int depth)
        Returns the ancestors which has a specified depth relative to this query.
        Parameters:
        depth - must be > 0. A value of 1 returns the immediate ancestor.
        Returns:
        the new query

      • getBusinessObject

        default <T> java.util.Optional<T> getBusinessObject(java.lang.Class<T> c)
        Retrieves the business object contained in the business object context if it is an instance of the specified class.
        Type Parameters:
        T - is the requested type.
        Parameters:
        c - is the class to which to cast the business object.
        Returns:
        an optional containing the context's business object. An empty optional if the context's business object is not an instance the specified class.
        Since:
        2.0

      • getFirstCommonAncestor

        static java.util.Optional<BusinessObjectContext> getFirstCommonAncestor(BusinessObjectContext q1,
                                                                        BusinessObjectContext q2)
        Since:
        2.0
